title: Global Covid Cases Hit Weekly Record Despite Vaccinations
content:
1. Global Covid Cases Hit Weekly Record Despite Vaccinations  Bloomberg
  2. Global Covid-19 Deaths Exceed 3 Million  Bloomberg Markets and Finance
  3. Minnesota reports 1,847 new COVID-19 cases, 15 more deaths Sunday  FOX 9
  4. Almost half of US states saw more COVID-19 cases this week. Experts say another surge can be stopped  WBAL Baltimore
  5. From Moscow to New York, delivery amid pandemic | Coronavirus | Covid-19 update | English News  WION
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ワクチン接種にもかかわらず、世界のコヴィド感染者数が週間記録を更新
尽管接种了疫苗，但全球柯维德病例仍创下周记录。
儘管接種了疫苗，但全球柯維德病例仍創下週記錄。
